direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding elements to the set, but 'addAll' adds a collection of elements.

Both methods modify the set, but 'remove' removes an element instead of adding it.
Both methods modify the set, but 'clear' removes all elements.
Both methods modify the set, but 'retainAll' retains only the elements in the specified collection.
Both methods modify the set, but 'removeIf' removes elements based on a predicate.
The 'add' method checks if an element is already in the set, similar to 'contains'.

Both methods modify the set, but 'remove(int)' removes an element by index.
